SELECT p.id, p.name, p.image, IFNULL(SUM(oi.quantity), 0) AS totalSold, MAX(o.create_time) AS lastSaleTime FROM products p LEFT JOIN order_item oi ON p.id = oi.product_id LEFT JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.id GROUP BY p.id, p.name, p.image
ORDER BY lastSaleTime DESC, totalSold DESC
ORDER BY totalSold DESC, lastSaleTime DESC
